error.name: BUFFERTOOSMALL
error.description: a provided buffer is too small

error.name: COULDNOTLOADLIBRARY
error.description: the library could not be loaded

error.name: COULDNOTFINDLIBRARYEXPORT
error.description: a required exported symbol could not be found in the library

error.name: INCOMPATIBLEBINARYVERSION
error.description: the version of the binary interface does not match the bindings interface

error.name: NOOUTSTATEGIVEN
error.description: no new outstate has been given

error.name: SQLITE_INTERNAL
error.description: SQLite: Internal logic error in SQLite

error.name: SQLITE_ABORT
error.description: SQLite: Callback routine requested an abort

error.name: SQLITE_BUSY
error.description: SQLite: The database file is locked

error.name: SQLITE_LOCKED
error.description: SQLite: A table in the database is locked

error.name: SQLITE_READONLY
error.description: SQLite: Attempt to write a readonly database

error.name: SQLITE_IOERR
error.description: SQLite: Some kind of disk I/O error occurred

error.name: SQLITE_CORRUPT
error.description: SQLite: The database disk image is malformed

error.name: SQLITE_FULL
error.description: SQLite: Insertion failed because database is full

error.name: SQLITE_CANTOPEN
error.description: SQLite: Unable to open the database file

error.name: SQLITE_TOOBIG
error.description: SQLite: String or BLOB exceeds size limit

error.name: SQLITE_CONSTRAINT
error.description: SQLite: Abort due to constraint violation

error.name: SQLITE_NOLFS
error.description: SQLite: Uses OS features not supported on host

error.name: SQLITE_RANGE
error.description: SQLite: 2nd parameter to sqlite3_bind out of range

error.name: SQLITE_NOTADB
error.description: SQLite: File opened that is not a database file

error.name: COULDNOTGETZIPENTRIES
error.description: Could not get ZIP file entries

error.name: COULDNOTREADFULLZIPDATA
error.description: Could not read full zip data

error.name: DRIVERALREADYRESERVED
error.description: Driver has already been reserved by an instance.

error.name: TEMPBASEPATHEMPTY
error.description: Empty base path for temporary files

error.name: COULDNOTFINDEVENTSENDERPAGE
error.description: Could not find event sender page

error.name: ONLYVALUEDPARAMETERSCANBEPERSISTENT
error.description: Only valued parameters can be persistent

error.name: COULDNOTGETTEMPPATHFROMWINDOWS
error.description: Could not get temp path from Windows

error.name: RESOURCEENTRYISNOUTF8STRING
error.description: Resource entry is no UTF8 string

error.name: EMPTYGROUPNAMEBUTPARAMETERGIVEN
error.description: Empty group name but parameter given

error.name: XMLDOESNOTCONTAINROOTNODE
error.description: XML does not contain root node.

error.name: XMLNODENOTFOUNDINLIST
error.description: XML node not found in list.

error.name: TOONEWDISCRETEFIELDFILEVERSION
error.description: Too new discrete field file version

error.name: TOONEWDISCRETEFIELDSTREAMTYPE
error.description: Too new discrete field stream type

error.name: DEFAULTROLEHASNOTBEENSET
error.description: Default role has not been set

method.name: ExpectsRawBody
method.description: checks if the raw body is needed to handle the request.

param.name: Value
param.description: Flag, if the raw body is needed in the request.

method.name: ExpectsFormData
method.description: checks if the parsed form data is needed to handle the request.

param.name: FieldCount
param.description: Number of Form Data entries that are expected.

param.name: Value
param.description: Flag, if the parsed form data is needed in the request.

method.name: GetFormDataDetails
method.description: returns details of expected form data.

param.name: Name
param.description: Name of the expected form data field.

param.name: IsFile
param.description: Flag, if the field Is a file field.

param.name: Mandatory
param.description: Flag, if the field MUST be present.

method.name: SetFormDataField
method.description: passes the a form data field to the request handler. Call only, if ExpectsFormData returns true.

param.name: Name
param.description: Name of the form data field.

method.name: SetFormStringField
method.description: passes the a form string field to the request handler. Call only, if ExpectsFormData returns true.

param.name: Name
param.description: Name of the form data field.

method.name: Handle
method.description: handles the request.

param.name: RawBody
param.description: Raw Body that was sent. Only necessary, if ExpectsRawBody returns true.

param.name: ContentType
param.description: the resulting Content Type String of the data.

param.name: HTTPCode
param.description: the resulting HTTP Errorcode (200 for success).

method.name: GetResultData
method.description: returns the cached stream content of the resulting data. Call only after Handle().

method.name: RegisterLibraryPath
method.description: registers a library for a given name.

param.name: LibraryResource
param.description: Path to the library resource file.

method.name: SetTempBasePath
method.description: sets the base path for temporary files.

method.name: ParseConfiguration
method.description: parses and initialises the state machines from a configuration XML.

method.name: StartAllThreads
method.description: starts the threads for all the state machines.

method.name: TerminateAllThreads
method.description: terminates the threads for all the state machines.

method.name: StartInstanceThread
method.description: starts a single instance thread.

param.name: InstanceName
param.description: Instance name of state machine to start.

method.name: TerminateInstanceThread
method.description: terminates a single instance thread.

param.name: InstanceName
param.description: Instance name of state machine to terminate.

method.name: GetInstanceThreadState
method.description: returns current state of a instance thread.

method.name: InstanceStateIsSuccessful
method.description: returns if an instance thread is in success state.

param.name: IsSuccessful
param.description: State of state machine is in success state.

method.name: InstanceStateHasFailed
method.description: returns if an instance thread is in failure state.

param.name: IsSuccessful
param.description: State of state machine is in failure state.

method.name: LoadClientPackage
method.description: load a client package to serve the client website.

method.name: Log
method.description: log message with a certain log level.

method.name: CreateAPIRequestHandler
method.description: creates an API request handler.

method.name: GetVersion
method.description: retrieves the binary version of this library.

param.name: Major
param.description: returns the major version of this library

param.name: Minor
param.description: returns the minor version of this library

param.name: Micro
param.description: returns the micro version of this library

method.name: GetLastError
method.description: Returns the last error recorded on this object

param.name: HasError
param.description: Is there a last error to query

method.name: ReleaseInstance
method.description: Releases shared ownership of an Instance

method.name: AcquireInstance
method.description: Acquires shared ownership of an Instance

method.name: InjectComponent
method.description: Injects an imported component for usage within this component

param.name: SymbolAddressMethod
param.description: Address of the SymbolAddressMethod of the injected component

method.name: CreateMCContext
method.description: Creates and initializes new MC Context.
